column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We went on a Saturday night (also Cinco de Mayo) so I was expecting a packed house. In fact
column2: we got quite the opposite: we were seated immediately
column3: but our service was not so immediate. I had to think they were understaffed or our waitress was overworked
column5: we waited 15 minutes before flagging her down just to get some water
column6: and put in our pizza order. This is the only I'm slighting this place a little bit and subtracting a star.
